title: Cobalt-B
description: Cobalt-B, featured as an obtainable SSR Simulacrum within the simulacrum system, associated with the weapon Flaming Revolver.

awaken.name: Sparks
awaken.description: After Cobalt-B uses her discharge skill, restore a random amount of weapon charge between 90 to 180 points.

trait_description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will set the target on fire for 8 seconds, causing damage equal to 58% of ATK every second. Ignited targets have 50% reduced healing efficacy.

elemental_resonance.Flame Resonance: Increase Flame ATK by 15% and Flame Resistance by 25%. Activate by equipping 2 or more Flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

1star.description: Each round of Barrage deals additional damage equal to 2% of the target's current HP (cannot exceed 200% of ATK).

3star.description: Heavy Bombardment branch skill, and Close Quarters dodge attack inflict Ion Scorch on targets that are already burned, dealing flame damage equal to 40% of their current ATK every second for 10 seconds.

5star.description: The damage from Ion Scorch increases to 60% of ATK. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skills will refresh the duration of Ion Scorch.

6star.description: Barrage has a 15-second burning effect. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skills reduce the cooldown of Barrage by 4 seconds. This cooldown of the effect: 1.5 seconds. The DoT burn from the dodge skill also triggers a cooldown reduction effect.

set_effects.2-piece: Increase damage against debuffed targets by 14% / 16% / 18% / 20%.
set_effects.4-piece: Restore 1 dodge attempt every 3 dodges. Dodge skills inflict burn upon hit, dealing damage equal to 24% / 30% / 36% / 42% of ATK every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds.

Normal Attack.description: On the ground, use normal attack button to launch 5 attacks in a row.

attacks.name: First Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 52.3% of ATK + 3.

attacks.name: Second Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 75.6% of ATK + 4.

attacks.name: Third Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 94.5% of ATK + 5.

attacks.name: Fourth Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 142.8% of ATK + 8.

attacks.name: Fifth Attack
attacks.damage: Deal damage equal to 137.8% of ATK + 7.

Charged Shot.description: Tap and hold normal attack to charge a shot and release to fire rounds, dealing 95.4% of ATK + 5 damage, plus an explosion 3 seconds later (or if the target dies), dealing 23.9% of ATK as damage to nearby enemies. Each time the target is dealt damage before the explosion (up to 4 times), AoE is doubled and damage is increased.

Jumping Blast.description: While airborne or after jumping once, use an aerial attack. Toss a bomb that deals damage equal to 90.8% of ATK + 5 to enemies in a circle ahead, knocking them back a certain distance. Consumes 250 endurance.

Aerial Discharge.description: After double-jumping, use a jump attack in the air. Fire an Omnium beam downward. The beam then sweeps forward, dealing damage equal to 33.8% of ATK + 2.

Heavy Bombardment.description: Hold attack button during a normal attack to unleash Suppressing Fire in front, dealing enemies 102% of ATK + 5 AoE damage.

dodge.Dodge: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for 0.5 seconds.
dodge.Close Quarters: Use normal attack right after dodging to trigger Close Quarters. Deal damage equal to 156.1% of ATK + 8 to targets in a frontal cone area.

skill.Barrage: Constant fire in a frontal cone area to deal 705.1% of ATK + 35 damage. Cooldown: 60 seconds.

discharge.Explosive Rain: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon removes all debuffs from the wielder and unleashes 3 grenades forward, dealing 570% of ATK + 30 AoE damage and causing launch.
